snippet.title: Leif's Adventure Friendship Trailer Steam
snippet.description:
Join the discord community: https://discord.gg/PATQTsT
Play the demo on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392980/Leifs_Adventure_Netherworld_Hero/
Wishlist now! 

"Play Leif's Adventure, a story-driven cooperative 2d action-adventure about friendship and teamwork. A boy never meant to be a hero, learns that pure strength is not always the answer! Guide two completely different characters through the adventure of their lifetime and witness how bonding is a powerful source to overcome any obstacle! The game's story mode can be played in either solo or coop mode. 

- Asymmetric two-character gameplay 
- 6 expanding worlds 
- Over 50 different weapons 
- Upgrade the skills of your characters 
- Screen-filling boss encounters 
- Secret mid-level-bosses 
- Exchangeable armor 

Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One
Release Q2-Q3 2021"
